content: दत्त, दतक, दत्रिम See under दा.

दत्त {%<ab>p. p.</ab>%} [दा कर्मणि-क्त] {@--1@} Given, given away, presented. {@--2@} Made over, delivered, assigned. {@--3@} Placed, stretched forth. {@--4@} Preserved, guarded; see दा. --त्तः {@--1@} One of the twelve kinds of sons in Hindu law; (also called दत्त्रिम); माता पिता वा दद्यातां यमद्भिः पुत्रमापदि . सदृशं प्रीतिसंयुक्तं स ज्ञेयो दत्त्रिमः सुतः .. <ls>Ms. 9. 168.</ls> {@--2@} A title added to the names of Vaiśyas; <ab>cf.</ab> the quotation under गुप्त. {@--3@} <ab>N.</ab> of a son of Atri and Anasūyā; see दत्तात्रेय below. --त्तं Gift, donation.
